name: Earthquake
effect:
:instant: During a [Town](../towns/index.md) siege:

:empower: 0 ➣ Remove 1 Gate or Wall obstacle of your choice.
:empower: 1 ➣ Remove 2 Gate or Wall obstacles of your choice.
:empower: 2 ➣ Every [unit](../units/index.md) adjacent to a Wall or Gate obstacle suffers 1 :damage:. Remove all Gate or Wall obstacles.

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
